name: Leftover Thanksgiving Turkey Sandwiches
description: About the author: Kerry Saretsky is a Serious Eats intern and the creator of French Revolution Food, where she reinvents her family's classic French recipes in a fresh, chic, modern way....
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound of thinly sliced roasted turkey breast
6 slices of good bacon, roasted at 425 degrees for 10 minutes

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the mayonnaise, lemon zest, lemon juice, salt and pepper, and paint it on both halves of the bread.
Fold each slice of Munster in half, and arrange, overlapping, so all the slices fit onto the bottom piece of ficelle.
Arrange the turkey on top of the cheese, followed by the bacon, and then the frisée.
Top with the top of the bread, and slice into as many sandwiches as your require.
Serve like this, or put into a Panini press for toasted sandwiches.
